description: Notification of change in status of the Abis connection
between a BSC and a TRX. There is an Abis connection per TRX.

Summary.eval: ($v2==1) ? 'TRX Abis link status is up' : 'TRX Abis link status is down'

description: Terminal Endpoint Identifier - The unique number in the BSS
that identifies this TRX. Same value as the index, repeated
for read-only access.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscTrxTeiValue

description: Operational status of main signalling connection between this TRX and
the BSC. LinkUp(True)/LinkDown(False).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscTrxAbisLinkStatus

description: Notification of change in status of the LUMbis connection to
the BSC.

Summary.eval: ($v2==1) ? 'TRAU link status is up' : 'TRAU link status is down'

description: TRAU Name.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscTrauName

description: Operational Status of the LUMbis Link. LinkUp(True)/LinkDown(False).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscTrauLinkStatus

description: Notification of BSC startup.
Configured name of BSC.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscName

description: Notification of the operational status of traffic-circuit-control
signalling connection between this TRX and the BSC.

Summary.eval: ($v2==1) ? 'Traffic-circuit-control signaling connection state is up' : 'Traffic-circuit-control signaling connection state is down'

description: Terminal Endpoint Identifier - The unique number in the BSS
that identifies this TRX. Same value as the index, repeated
for read-only access.

description: Operational status of traffic-circuit-control signalling connection
between this TRX and the BSC. LinkUp(True)/LinkDown(False).
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscTrxTrauLinkStatus

description: Notification of the expiration of the bsc license.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseExpirationNotification VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscName s EXAMPLE VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseHostId s EXAMPLE VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseVersion s EXAMPLE

description: Configured name of BSC.

description: Version information about the current license.
variables.name: VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseVersion

description: Notification that the bsc license has expired and the system is
currently operating in the grace period.

event.Summary: BSC license expired on $v5. System operation is in grace period (version:$v3)

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseGracePeriodNotification VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscName s EXAMPLE VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseHostId s EXAMPLE VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseVersion s EXAMPLE VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseDaysRemaining i 9999 VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseExpirationDate s 2021-04-23 VANU-GERAN-BSC-MIB::geranBscLicenseGracePeriod i 9999
